comment.author: 7912554@N05
comment._content: She has a strong, interesting, intelligent face - not a woman to be trifled with.  And yet, she looks warm and not without a sense of humor.  I wish more was known about her.

comment.author: 61932480@N00
comment._content: Mrs. Pavlov always sat up straighter whenever the doorbell rang.

comment.author: 8638861@N02
comment._content: they didn't need hairspray because their hair was greasy and thus easy to style and leave in place... soaps did not come about until the turn of the 20th century.

comment.author: 47770417@N03
comment._content: I like the first comment. I can totally see her as a modern day actress. Would be beautiful with a different hairstyle and makeup.
